path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/HAECHI_AUDIT/[HAECHI AUDIT] Iskra Bridge Smart Contract Audit Report v1.1.pdf

findings.title: When moving assets between chains, user can avoid paying serviceFee by calling returnTransfer twice
findings.description: A logic bug allowing users to bypass service fees by calling returnTransfer function twice during asset transfer between chains.

findings.title: Improper positioning of user input validation
findings.description: When transferring ERC20 tokens on a cross-chain using Iskra Bridge, user funds may be frozen due to the difference in validation between fromChain and toChain.
